TenderNotice.title: Notice Inviting e-Tender
TenderNotice.invitationTo: Central & State Public Sector Undertakings/Enterprises and eligible Contractors/Firms/Agencies of appropriate class registered with state PWDs/CPWD/MES Railway/P&T or other registered firms.

tenderDetails.nameOfWork: Construction of Aluminum Partition wall, Structural fabrication and allied works for setting up a DST lab in IC Engine lab at NIT Agartala.

biddingProcess.instructions: Bidders shall participate in bidding online only. Bids can be submitted 24x7 until the closing time. Re-submission is allowed, and the latest submitted bid will be considered. No physical submission is permitted.

bidOpening.process: Bid(s) shall be opened online by respective Bid openers on behalf of NIT Agartala.
bidOpening.access: Accessible by intending Bidders through the website https://eprocure.gov.in.
bidOpening.physicalPresence: Intending bidders and other Bidders may be present at the Bid opening.

additionalInfo.corrigendumNote: Any subsequent corrigendum will be available on the website only.
